release-notes.release-note: 1. Supports retrieving credentials from CyberArk Vault via AIM credential provider 2 Support retrieving secrets from CyberArk Conjur containers via REST API 3. Support secured output properties
Created an SSL Context for sending client certificates to the CyberArk server.
Added step to retrieve password from Central Credential Provider Web API.
Added 'Property Prefix' field to 'Get Password from CCP' step.
RFE 128463 - Property to enable SSL debugging.
